# lp-button-group

```js
import '@liveperson-design-system/components/button-group';
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                   | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `"default" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   |             | `"dark" \| "light"`    | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event   | Description                                           | Type               |
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `click` | Fires when user clicks on any button inside the group | `CustomEvent<any>` |
